name: Alexandra Rivera
persona: Alexandra Rivera is a 21-year-old psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.75. She is moderately motivated and believes in her ability to improve academically, though she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and maintaining consistent study habits. Alexandra tends to handle exam stress well and shows determination to push through challenges, but she is still working on finding strategies to boost her academic performance. She is eager to learn and is looking for ways to better regulate her effort and achieve her grade goals.
